summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Community Development Commission (CDC) of Dallas is holding its monthly meeting on October 10, 2024, at 6:00 PM at Dallas City Hall, Conference Room 6ES. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss community development initiatives, review past meeting outcomes, and plan for the upcoming fiscal year.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the September 5, 2024, CDC meeting.
2. Updates from the Citizen Participation / Policy and Procedure (CPPP) Committee.
3. Community Development Division report, including scheduling for FY 2024-25 meetings.

**Important Details**:  
- The CPPP Committee will provide an update on their September 24 meeting outcomes.
- A briefing will be presented regarding the proposed meeting dates for the FY 2024-25 Community Development Commission Monthly Calendar, which will be subject to approval.

**Action Items**:  
The primary action item is the consideration and approval of the meeting dates for the FY 2024-25 Community Development Commission Monthly Calendar. Additionally, public speakers will have the opportunity to address the commission, and announcements regarding upcoming events will be made.

The meeting will also include provisions for reasonable accommodations for participants, and a video stream will be available post-meeting for public access.
